item.enc_vanilla.biome_crystal.desc: Use the dispenser to fire a fire charge at it to turn it into a heated biome crystal, throw it into the powder snow to get a frozen biome crystal
item.enc_vanilla.heated_biome_crystal.de: Use it on a water cauldron to get frozen biome crystal
item.enc_vanilla.frozen_biome_crystal.de: Throw it in the fire to get a biome crystal
message.enc_vanilla.safe_harvest.not_mat: The crop is not ready to be harvested!
message.enc_vanilla.book_save.title: Save Book
message.enc_vanilla.book_save.question: Are you sure you want to close the book without saving?
death.attack.enc_vanilla.stonecutter: %1$s cut itself to death with a stonecutter
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableVi: Villagers can be attracted by the player holding an emerald (by default) in the main hand and an ominous banner in the offhand.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.mainHand: Change the main hand items needed to attract villagers
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableIn: You can use a Splash Invisibility Potion on an item frame to make it invisible, as well as a Splash Water Bottle to de-invisible it.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableTo: You can attack creatures with torches or soul torches to give them a chance to catch fire.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableMo: Creatures attacking with torches now also catch enemies on fire.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.torchHit: Chance that a torch attack will set an enemy on fire
Duration for a torch attack to set an enemy on fire
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.extraTor: Configure items from other mods that can be considered torches
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.extraSou: Configure items from other mods that can be considered soul torches
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableFa: Now when you have a slow falling effect, you won't be trampling farmland.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableWa: You could just drop the concrete into the water and let them solidify.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableMu: You can throw dirt in the water to get mud.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableAn: You can repair a stage by shift right-clicking the anvil with the anvil repair material.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.anvilRep: Materials needed to repair an anvil
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableBe: Ringing the bell now repels phantoms within a 24-block radius.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.particle: Duration of the purple particle effect on the wings of repelled phantom
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableHi: Mobs that prevent you from sleeping are now highlighted for 3s.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSp: You can now place a sponge directly on the water without having to place a cube next to it first.
You have to sneak in order to place a sponge directly on the water.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableHe: Players within a certain radius of a campfire now get the Regeneration effect.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.healingR: Players within what radius from the campfire are healed.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.effectDu: Duration of the regeneration effect each time you get it
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.effectLe: Level of regeneration effect each time you get it
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableRi: Crops can now be harvested by right clicking.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.required: Whether or not you need to hold a hoe
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.hungerCo: Food exhaustion for each right-click harvest, the final cost is the value multiplied by 0.005.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableHa: Harvesting crops will now gain experience.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSt: Potions can be stacked up to 16.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.throwabl: Cooldown time for Splash and Lingering potions
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.torchFlo: TorchFlower light level when fully grown
light level of the first stage of the torchflower
light level of the second stage of the torchflower
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableBu: Now you can walk through the sweet berry bushes wearing leggings without getting hurt.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.needLegg: You need to wear leggings to be immune to damage.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.permanen: Villagers will never be harmed by sweet berry bushes.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSl: You are immune to damage, but you will still move slower.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSt: Players standing on the stonecutter will continue to take damage.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableFo: Items now have a tag called "forced_fuels" that forces them into the furnace's fuel slot even if they have a recipe for smelting.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.extraFor: Configure items from other mods that can be considered forced fuels.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableBl: Now you can place blocks above the lily pads, which works by turning the block underneath into waterlogged lily pad.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enablePa: You can now right-click on a painting to quickly switch between paintings.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableCu: Now you can right-click on the vine to convert it and the vines below it into cut vines, which will not grow.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSt: Now you can right-click on bamboo with axes or sugar cane with shears to stop them growing.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSh: Now you can use a name tag to name a mob "Shutup!" to make it silent.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableJu: Now the jukebox will loop the music disc.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableCa: Now you can destroy a whole cake to get it.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableCe: Now you can place torches on the ceiling.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSa: Now you need to sneak in order to reclaim the lava with a bucket to prevent accidentally destroying the lava lake.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enablePl: Now you can just right-click to place a chest on the boat.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableNa: Named monsters now don't despawn in peaceful mode.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSa: You will not be able to destroy immature crops.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableDo: You can open double doors with a single click.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableBr: Now, players will be alerted when the lead breaks.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSt: Right-click the piston with the slime ball to obtain sticky piston.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableTh: Fire charge can now be thrown directly with a right-click.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableCo: Now you can make it compress into a compressed Slime block by placing an anvil on top of two consecutive slime blocks above and below.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSc: The sculk compass will point to the biome corresponding to the biome crystal.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSl: When you come to the Slime chunk with a frog bucket in your inventory, the frog bucket will be animated.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableFa: Night vision now fades out instead of flickering.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.fadingOu: Duration of night vision effect fade out
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableBe: The player's ping is now displayed as a number.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableDe: The vanilla ping bars will also show.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableLo: Chat history now extends from the vanilla 100 to 4096.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.chatMaxM: Maximum number of messages retained in chat history
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableTi: The time is now displayed before the chat message.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.timeStam: The color of the time displayed
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableBi: Entering a new biome now displays the biome title.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.hideInF1: The title will not be displayed in the F1 screen.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.hideInF3: The title will not be displayed in the F3 screen.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.displayD: Title display time except fade-in/fade-out time
Taking the center of the screen minus the height of the title as the origin of the coordinate axis, the offset of the coordinate axis of y
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.cooldown: Entering a new biome when the cooldown is set to 0 will directly switch titles.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableMo: Mod names are now displayed after the biome name.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableUn: The title is also displayed when the player is underground.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableFa: The speed at which you climb the ladder now changes depending on your viewpoint orientation when you're on the ladder.
Whether to enable faster upward laddering.
Whether to enable faster downward laddering.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.speedMul: Speed multiplier, multiplied by the angle sin value, 2.0 corresponds to 30 degrees for the original speed.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableBo: Now you can use the mouse wheel to turn the pages of the book.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.ctrlSpee: The speed acceleration multiplier when you press Ctrl.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enablePa: Whether to play a page-turning sound when using the scroll wheel to turn pages.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableBe: You can now see the number of bees and the amount of honey in beehives and bee nests, just like the feature added natively in 1.21.2.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableAx: Now buckets containing different variants of axolotl display different textures.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableCh: Leaving the world now will not clear your chat history.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableBo: When you make changes to the content of a book and close it without saving, a prompt will pop up reminding you to save.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableMo: You can now compost even more items, which include rotten flesh, dead bush, grass blocks and more.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSl: Add recipes for all slabs to blocks.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableSp: Now you can use campfire drying sponges.
yacl3.config.enc_vanilla:config.enableBe: You can now use the 1.21.5 lodestone recipe and find it in ruined portal treasure chests.
